artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Published by Minatoya Kohei
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
marks: Right: 梓元乃應需豊國画 {hanmoto no ōju Toyokuni ga} |  C,
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
text: Related to the play Imayō mochizuki 今様望月, performed at the Nakamura Theater, 1848, 8th month.
title: The Actors Ichikawa Kuzō II as Mochizuki Saemon (R), Nakamura Utaemon IV as Ōtaka Tonomo (C), and Iwai Kumesaburō III as Innami Kazuma (L)
